description: Retrieves the map style descriptor from a map resource. The style descriptor contains speciï¬cations on how features render on a map. For example, what data to display, what order to display the data in, and the style for the data. Style descriptors follow the Mapbox Style Specification.

parameters.name: MapName
parameters.description: The map resource to retrieve the style descriptor from.

nested_items.name: Blob
nested_items.description: Contains the body of the style descriptor.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: The style descriptor's content type. For example, application/json.

nested_items.name: CacheControl
nested_items.description: The HTTP Cache-Control directive for the value.
